item.title: CVE-2022-40213|2024-09-17T00:11:24.945Z -- gs%20plugins -- gs%20testimonial%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Authenticated (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in GS Testimonial Slider plugin <= 1.9.6 at WordPress.
